name: TechnoSpire
description:
An adventure/puzzle game inspired by the classic game "Shadowgate" for the NES.

You are done with today's work, but as you try to leave you notice you left your car keys in the office. Things quickly take a turn for the weird as a wizard seems to have taken them!

Some actions might turn out deadly, so don't forget that 'Save' button..

Stuck? Watch the playthrough here:
